text: new certification course banner for integrating with HubSpot I: foundations :mega: Integrating With HubSpot I: Foundations Has Launched!  HubSpot is a powerful development platform that offers APIs and other tools to help you integrate with and extend HubSpot’s CRM and its different Hubs. Creating quality integrations with HubSpot requires some familiarity with HubSpot’s CRM, its different Hubs, and its API endpoints. In this certification course, we’ll establish a foundation to help you begin integrating with and extending HubSpot. This certification is also launcing during <https://academy.HubSpot.com/certification-week|World Certification Week>! Throughout the week, for every certification earned by learners, HubSpot will donate $5 (up to $50,000) to charities around the globe. :rocket: Take the certification button
